Items.Effect: For every [^Purple] invention you draft, gain 1[^Money]
For every [^Green] invention you draft, gain 1[^Money]
For every [^Yellow] invention you draft, gain 1[^Money]
For every [^Dimensional] invention you draft, gain 1[^Money]
For every [^Robotic] invention you draft, gain 1[^Money]
For every [^Biotech] invention you draft, gain 1[^Money]
Each player that drafted the most [^Purple] inventions gains 4[^Money]
Each player that drafted the most [^Green] inventions gains 4[^Money]
Each player that drafted the most [^Yellow] inventions gains 4[^Money]
Each player that drafted the most [^Dimensional] inventions gains 4[^Money]
Each player that drafted the most [^Robotic] inventions gains 4[^Money]
Each player that drafted the most [^Biotech] inventions gains 4[^Money]
For every [^Purple] invention you invent, gain 2[^Money]
For every [^Green] invention you invent, gain 2[^Money]
For every [^Yellow] invention you invent, gain 2[^Money]
For every [^Dimensional] invention you invent, gain 2[^Money]
For every [^Robotic] invention you invent, gain 2[^Money]
For every [^Biotech] invention you invent, gain 2[^Money]
